Title: Pilot (2)
Plot: Hoping that new DNA tests will reveal the killer's identity, DCI Boyd has the original abductee's body exhumed.  But he soon comes to discover that the kidnapper is looking for more than money -- he wants revenge on Boyd's team.
GuestStars: Noel Clarke,  Amelia Warner,  Elaine Claxton,  Steven Elder,  Sam Loggin,  Finbar Lynch,  Lachlan  Ryan,  David Sterne,  Roger  Taylor,  John Vine,  Adie Allen,  Tyler Butterworth
